name: heartglowai-secure-api
description: Secure API server for HeartGlowAI web application

scripts.backup: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const d=new Date(); const dir='backups/backup-'+d.toISOString().replace(/:/g,'-'); fs.mkdirSync(dir, {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('web-build/index.html', dir+'/index.html'); console.log('Backup created at '+dir)"
scripts.restore: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const backupDir=fs.readdirSync('backups').sort().pop(); if(backupDir) { console.log('Restoring from '+backupDir); fs.copyFileSync(path.join('backups', backupDir, 'index.html'), 'web-build/index.html'); console.log('Restored!'); } else { console.log('No backups found!'); }"
